description: Okex.Net is a .Net wrapper for the Okex API. It includes all features the API provides, REST API and Websocket, using clear and readable objects including but not limited to Reading market info, Placing and managing orders and Reading balances and funds
releaseNotes:
Version 1.5.8 - 12 Jan 2021
- Updated CryptoExchange.Net to 3.5.0
      
Version 1.5.7 - 28 Dec 2020
- Fixed minor bugs

Version 1.5.6 - 22 Dec 2020
